question: A man can swim at 3km/hr in still water. If the velocity of the stream is 2km/hr, the time taken by him to swim to a place 10 km upstream and back is :
explanation:
Rate downstream = 5 kmph
Rate upstream = 1 kmph
âˆ´ Required time = $latex \\frac{10}{5}+\\frac{10}{1} = 12 hours&s=1$
Hence option [A] is the right answer.
